recipe.title: Baby Peas with Mustard Horseradish Butter
instructions: Cook peas with water and salt in a 2-quart saucepan, covered, over moderate heat, until tender, 5 to 8 minutes.
Meanwhile, mash together remaining ingredients and salt and pepper to taste in a small bowl. Drain peas in a colander and return to pan, then stir in butter mixture.
